item.title: Notes on Microeconomics
item.description: Preference Utility Function Continuous Preference Choice Choice Function Rational Choice Function WARP (Weak Axiom of Revealed Preference) Consumer Preference Convex Homothetic Preference Quasi-Linear Preference Differentiable Preference Demand Demand with Differentiable Preference Demand Function Rational Demand Function WARP (revisited) SARP (Strong Axiom of Revealed Preference) Law of Demand Indirect Preference (Over Budget Sets) Dual Consumer Duality Properties Producer Technology Production Function Supply Law of Supply Partial Equilibrium Perfect Competition (Short Run) Perfect Competition (Long Run) Monopoly Cournot (Quantity) Bertrand Duopoly (Price) Welfare General Equilibrium Exchange Economy Core Competitive Market Textbook 1: Lecture Notes in Microeconomic Theory (~ #Producer)
